@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+! { dg-do link }
+! { dg-options "-fcoarray=lib -lcaf_single" }
+
+program coarray_43
+  implicit none
+  integer, parameter :: STR_LEN = 50
+  character(len=STR_LEN) :: str[*]
+  integer :: pos
+  write(str,"(2(a,i2))") "Greetings from image ",this_image()," of ",num_images()
+  block
+    pos = scan(str[5], set="123456789")
+  end block
+end program
